full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**

### Invitation to Qualify for Data Collection Modernization (DCM) Requirements

**Notice Title:** Invitation to Qualify (ITQ) for Data Collection Modernization (DCM)

**Reference Number:** WS 410 504 5039 - Doc 426 557 0243

**Publication Date:** October 18, 2023

**Closing Date:** November 22, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST

The Department of Public Works and Government Services Canada, on behalf of the Office of the Superintendent of Financial Institutions, invites industry to respond to the Data Collection Modernization (DCM) requirements. All bidders must submit their qualifications by the aforementioned deadline.

**Requirements:**

*   The evaluation of bids will be based on a combination of technical merit and price.
*   The successful bidder will be required to provide a range of services, including but not limited to, data collection, data integration, and data analysis.
*   The bidder must demonstrate an understanding of data management best practices and be familiar with industry-standard tools and methodologies.

**Additional Information:**

*   The tender description and all relevant documentation can be found on the SAP Ariba platform, accessible through the link provided below: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17759370
*   All bidders are expected to acknowledge and comply with the terms and conditions outlined in the tender documents.
*   For any questions or concerns, please contact Melanie Beauvais, Lefort, SPAC/PSPC at [melanie.beauvais-lefort@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:melanie.beauvais-lefort@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).

**Trade Agreements:**

*   This tender is open to bidders from Canada and partner countries as per the Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement, Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership, World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement.

**Contracting Entity:**

*   Department of Public Works and Government Services Canada
*   11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5

**Contact Information:**
